scripts.setup:components: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['src/components', 'src/assets'].forEach(dir => { const fullPath = path.join(process.cwd(), dir); if (!fs.existsSync(fullPath)) { fs.mkdirSync(fullPath, { recursive: true }); console.log(`Created: ${dir}`); } else { console.log(`Already exists: ${dir}`); } }); console.log('\nâœ… Folder structure ready!\n');"
